text: Y’all know the trick with forcing an Eevee to evolve into whichever you are looking for? If you nickname it Sparky, it will evolve to a Jolteon, if you nickname it Rainer it will become a Vaporeon, and if you nickname it Pyro, it will become a Flareon… people have been saying that sometimes when they nickname non-Eevee’s to Pyro, they evolve into Flareon so that might be worth a shot too :stuck_out_tongue:
it works - unless you name yours Ranier instead of Rainer
I did that!.. got a Jolteon this weekend
In my defense, the guy who told me about it definitely said Ranier!
a couple more Eevees and I’ll try it again...
i heard it only works once, but i haven’t tried it more than once
can confirm, it works multiple times :thumbsup::skin-tone-3:
oh sure, I gotta go to a meeting, and a Charmader spawns in the ‘hood...
